meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sinuous.
meanings.sent1: The river's sinuousnesses made it difficult to navigate.
meanings.sent2: The sinuousnesses of the snake's movements fascinated the onlookers.
meanings.sent3: The sinuousnesses of the road caused the driver to take a longer route.
meanings.sent4: The sinuousnesses of the dance routine captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The sinuousnesses of the tree branches created a beautiful pattern against the sky.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being sinuous in shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The artist captured the sinuousnesses of the waves in her painting.
meanings.sent2: The sinuousnesses of the mountain path made it challenging to climb.
meanings.sent3: The sinuousnesses of the roller coaster track added excitement to the ride.
meanings.sent4: The sinuousnesses of the calligraphy strokes gave the writing an elegant look.
meanings.sent5: The sinuousnesses of the cat's movements were graceful and fluid.
